name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Shining Memory ⧸ ラストに重大告知‼【#星街すいせい5周年LIVE 】 [GbIIr3waYzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro sequence featuring title graphics and animations of Hoshimachi Suisei.
Hoshimachi Suisei performs 'Kimi no Yoru wo Kure' in a cozy room setting.
scenes.song_name: 君の夜をくれ (Kimi no Yoru wo Kure)

subtitles.original: ずっと話したかった
subtitles.english: I've always wanted to talk to you.

subtitles.original: 無くしてしまった夜の言葉
subtitles.english: About the words of the night that I've lost.

subtitles.original: 悲しい話じゃない 寂しくなるけど
subtitles.english: It's not a sad story, although it makes me lonely.

subtitles.original: いいんだ
subtitles.english: It's okay.

subtitles.original:
君の夜をくれ
作詞・作曲：古川本舗
subtitles.english:
Give Me Your Night
Lyrics & Composition: Furukawa Honpo

subtitles.original: 灯をずっと消したままで 眠れない日は
subtitles.english: On days when I can't sleep with the lights turned off.

subtitles.original: 冷めてしまったコーヒーに逃げ込んでみる
subtitles.english: I try to take refuge in my cold coffee.

subtitles.original: 借りたままだったレコードに針を落としたら
subtitles.english: If I drop the needle on the record I borrowed.

subtitles.original: 情けないステップで踊り出せる
subtitles.english: I can start dancing with pathetic steps.

subtitles.original: ずっと ずっと 待ち焦がれた
subtitles.english: I've been waiting for so long.

subtitles.original: 明け方の陽も消えない今日も
subtitles.english: For the morning light, even today when it doesn't fade.

subtitles.original: 今夜 今日のこの夜に
subtitles.english: Tonight, in this very night.

subtitles.original: 沈んでしまっても
subtitles.english: Even if it sinks away.

subtitles.original: きっと街の影を 照らす明かりが
subtitles.english: Surely, the lights illuminating the shadows of the city.

subtitles.original: 昨日と違って 柔らかく見えたから
subtitles.english: Looked softer than yesterday.

subtitles.original: 目を閉じるよ
subtitles.english: I'll close my eyes.

subtitles.original: 眠りにつくよ
subtitles.english: I'll fall asleep.

subtitles.original: 君の夜をくれ
subtitles.english: Give me your night.

subtitles.original: ずっと ずっと 聞きたかった
subtitles.english: I've always wanted to hear it.

subtitles.original: 明け方の陽に笑い合う声を
subtitles.english: Our voices laughing together in the morning light.

subtitles.original: 今夜 今日のこの夜も
subtitles.english: Tonight, this night as well.

subtitles.original: 終わってしまうけど
subtitles.english: It will come to an end, but...

subtitles.original: 灯は小さく点けたまま 目を伏せて
subtitles.english: Leaving the light on low, I cast my eyes down.
